text:
Now there was a famine in the land.
So Abram went down to Egypt to sojourn there.
For great was the famine in the land.

And it happened that as he was about to enter Egypt he said to Sarai his wife,
“Behold, I know that you are woman beautiful in appearance.

It will happen that if the Egyptians see you that they will say, ‘This is his wife.’
And they will kill me.
And they will let you live.

Please say that you are my sister,
This way it will be good for me on account of you.
And my life will remain living because of you.”
